title: How To Be A Rebel Girl üí™
description:
How do you instill confidence in young girls in a world that constantly depicts them as damsels in distress? You change the narrative. CEO Jes Wolfe and the Rebel Girls team are doing just that with their girl-centric edu-tainment company.

Learn more at the Rebel Girls website

Follow Rebel Girls on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, or YouTube

Order your own copy of one of the Goodnight Stories books

Listen to the Rebel Girls podcast

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what‚Äôs making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is ‚ÄúSmile‚Äù by Ryan Innes
